subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3956, how did it go?
description_text:
Bonjour a ce jour je n ai toujours pas reçu les capteurs que vous deviez m'
envoyer je voudrais savoir ou cela en ai cordialement

Le sam. 27 déc. 2025 à 18:12, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> a écrit :

> Hello PATRICE, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrice BAROS,  ​  We apologize for the delay. Your package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive within the next couple of days. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047219387016
